alert.note: Alert for Deaf Smith (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 15 at 10:17PM CDT until September 15 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Deaf Smith County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1016 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bellview, or 27 miles north of Clovis, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Deaf Smith County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
